Ms Threatens To Withdraw Advertising Bucks

24 Jun 1999

In response to the U.S. congress' threats to pass legislation requiring stricter privacy requirements for web sites, Microsoft has threatened to withdraw advertising dollars from sites that don't post their privacy policies. Read more in Salon.com, or skim the article on the Upside web site.
